verses.roman:
sanātanera vārtā yabe gosāñi puchila
rūpa kahe,--'ta-ra saṅge dekhā nā ha-ila

synonyms: sanātanera vārtā—news of Sanātana Gosvāmī; yabe—when; gosāñi—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; puchila—inquired; rūpa kahe—Rūpa Gosvāmī says; tāra saṅge—with him; dekhā nā ha-ila—there was no meeting.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu inquired about Sanātana Gosvāmī, Rūpa Gosvāmī replied, "I did not meet him.
